community/how-to-join-community.title: Join a Community
community/how-to-join-community.description: All you need is an invitation link to the community you want to join.

general/dapp-browser.title: Dapp Browser
general/dapp-browser.description: Buidler DApp Browser is a more efficient and secure way for your members to explore decentralized applications without ever leaving your community.

general/wallet-to-wallet-chat.title: Wallet-to-wallet Chat
general/wallet-to-wallet-chat.description: Buidler is designed to help you communicate directly with other blockchain users in a trustworthy way while remaining anonymous.

general/what-is-buidler.title: What is Buidler
general/what-is-buidler.description: Buidler is a Web3 Messaging App for your community, teams, and supporters to connect, communicate and collaborate. By perfectly combining social messaging and crypto wallet, the mission of Buidler is to make Web3 more useful for everyone and make Web3 happen.

wallet/connect-via-metamask-walletconnec.title: Connect via MetaMask and WalletConnect
wallet/connect-via-metamask-walletconnec.description: Currently, Buidler only supports connecting through MetaMask and WalletConnect on the browser. This feature enables you to conveniently access and manage your crypto assets within the Buidler platform.

wallet/connect-via-social.title: Connect via Social Login
wallet/connect-via-social.description: Getting started with Buidler is now easier with the integration of Web3Auth. You can now log in to your Buidler account using your existing social accounts like Google, Facebook, Apple, and Discord.

wallet/getting-started.title: Getting Started
wallet/getting-started.description: Builder is a web3 native platform, meaning your account is identified by your wallet address, not an email address, phone number, or password like in traditional web2 platforms.

wallet/how-copy-address.title: Copy Wallet Address
wallet/how-copy-address.description: To copy your wallet address on Builder, you will need to follow a few simple steps:

wallet/how-to-backup-wallet.title: Backup a Wallet
wallet/how-to-backup-wallet.description: Backing up your private key and seed phrase is a critical step for securing your cryptocurrency assets. A private key is a unique, alphanumeric code that acts as a password for accessing your wallet. The seed phrase, also known as a mnemonic phrase, is a sequence of words that can be used to generate the private key.

wallet/how-to-create-wallet.title: Create a Wallet
wallet/how-to-create-wallet.description: Builder is a web3 native platform that allows you to securely store, send, and receive tokens, NFTs, and cryptocurrencies. In other words, Builder is just a crypto wallet. Just download the Buidler app on iOS or macOS and follow these steps to make a new wallet:

wallet/how-to-import-wallet.title: Import a Wallet
wallet/how-to-import-wallet.description: If you already have a wallet, you can import it to Buidler using your seed phrase or private key. Download the Buidler app on iOS or macOS and follow the instructions to import your wallet.
